name: Anish Mulay
education: Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai, India — Bachelor of Technology, Master of Technology (Dual Degree) Nov. 2021 – Jul. 2026; Major – Data Science and Artificial Intelligence; CGPA 8.66/10
projects: • Developed Decisive, a framework for document-grounded decision-making tailored to user’s preferences
• Developed a probabilistic Dirichlet preference model updated through information-gain based user clarifications
• Developed a strategy combining DPO (syntax alignment) with QA-based CoT fine-tuning for data-scarce DSLs
• Developed a What-If simulator using knowledge graphs to gauge the impact of global events on the supply chain
Guide : Prof Balaraman Ravindran — Wadhwani School of Data Science and AI, IIT Madras Research Project
